review: Quits working and starts buffering and freezing after about an hour or so of use. Resetting it does not solve the problem. It could be a great product if they get the bugs worked out of it!! review: This thing works great.  We had a Roku and it was always buffering, I thought it might be my internet connection.  We haven't had any issues with the fire stick and we have watched several hours of programming from Netflix and Amazon.
